website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and compact table in a classic design that works in just about any outdoor setting. Excellent quality at a very reasonable price.
pros: Solidly constructed and heavy enough to stay put in windy conditions
Zinc plated and powder-coated to withstand the elements
Mid-sized dimensions meet the needs of most without taking up too much space
Seats four with room to spare, but manages to accommodate up to six
cons: It's not quite as large as a standard-sized table

customer_reviews.title: it is nothing like the picture shown
customer_reviews.text: Cute little table. However, it is nothing like the picture shown. The mesh is completely different and the corners of the table are square not rounded. I was hoping it was identical to the one I have. The price for this product is not worth it. It is worth 65 dollars. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy and heavy enough that the wind won't take off with it, but 1 person can still scoot it around. Big enough for 6 people to squeeze into for a game or meal
customer_reviews.author: mrs042515

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected even with sizes being listed, photo does not reflect size correctly. Most chairs that can fit are 4 and very tight. Flimsily wing nut attachments hold base and top together, may not stand test of time. Would not purchase again. Too much of a pain to return. Not worth $$$ by any reasonable thought.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Could not be better!
customer_reviews.text: This table is extremely sturdy, well constructed, and beautiful. Assembly could not be easier. It's main role is to hold a 10' tall, 9' umbrella. The umbrella is an open weave that is essential for the sudden and brief very high velocity winds that come out of nowhere in the desert southwest. The table stands its ground. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table but poorly packaged and arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table but poorly packaged and arrived damaged. The corner was mashed and I had to file down the sharp edge and then use some patio furniture paint to cover up the bare metal. A different corner was bent way in so I had to use tools to straighten it and then again use patio furniture paint to cover up the bare metal. Be aware that the item you get is not the item pictured. Mine has square corners, not rounded like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Addition to My Deck
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, quality product that I hope will serve for a long time. It's a little smaller than I would have liked but the best value available, based upon specs and customer reviews. It's worth emphasizing the cross-bracing under the surface (visible in the photo but not mentioned in any review I read) that provides additional heft and rigidity. I did not encounter any of the negatives cited in some reviews - in particular, signing up for Amazon Prime to expedite shipping and avoid damage en route..
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: It has all of the features we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a sturdy and heavy metal table to be a patio umbrella holder and a bird feeding platform. For the price, this table works fine and looks similar to picture. (Corners are not rounded) We were also pleased that it also solved the problem of squirrels chewing on the aluminum trim on the side our house; they chew on the edges of the table instead. The top was considerably bent when it arrived but we jumped around on it until looked pretty straight. We like the table.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: This table is very heavy-duty and very modern!
customer_reviews.text: The packing and shipping was not at all impressive. The first table came without the table top, only the legs, the box was torn open across the top of the box. I recommend much heavier duty cardboard. After deciding to have the first table replaced and waiting another two and a half weeks, I am very happy with the table, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alison K. Sale

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting for $250
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these tables and reading the directions carefully, they were easy enough to put together but a few threads were striped out and my husband put teflon tape on it to then screw together, which seemed to fix the problem. But, the tables are unlevel (we put 2 together) and not very sturdy. Want to see what is involved in returning because definitely not worth $250 each.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and arrived in poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived all torn up, and some of the pieces were bent. Not sure if this happened at the manufacturer or in shipment. No assembly directions were included... although it’s fairly simple to assemble. A bit rickety once assembled. Expensive for what it is. It was the right size for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: ABH

customer_reviews.title: Table is not as shown and described
customer_reviews.text: The table I received is not the table pictured and described. I did receive a table with the same manufacturers number, but the appearance is very different. The top is not the mesh pictured, but is a sheet of metal in which square holes have been cut out. The corners are not rounded as shown but a squared off and are sharp enough to cause damage to furniture or people. It is the size I needed and exchanging it will get me the same thing I have now. Just be aware that it is not what you think you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: jhIN

customer_reviews.title: Not with the money
customer_reviews.text: The other customers are correct: poor packaging, corners are not round, no instructions, smaller than I thought, not mesh but square cutouts and definitely not worth over $200.00. I too don’t want to go through hassle to return. Providing this review is next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Party for 10
customer_reviews.text: I pushed two of these tables together & it's great for 10 people. We love entertaining & serving meals n them.
customer_reviews.author: Punk

customer_reviews.title: Can I get the missing parts please?
customer_reviews.text: The table seems sturdy but I would no better if it came with nuts to hold it together. There is no option to just request just the missing parts without returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheray T. Magagi

customer_reviews.title: those are terrible to clean up
customer_reviews.text: Our last glass table shattered and let me says, those are terrible to clean up. While it is not quite as large as I would desire, it does the job and it is worry free. It is setup to take the umbrella in the middle and it is solid construction, easy to assemble. You have to watch small items as they may fall thru the mesh. For the most part, our family is extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mc

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and heavy table for my patio. Slight rust detected on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Ailin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Clean, Sturdy Design - Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived in a timely manner and was packed very tight so nothing moved around as one would hope. Assembly was very simple, two sections to assemble the legs and four screws to attach to table top. Overall a very sturdy table with easy assembly. Worth every dollar, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: and I expect this will last many years based on the sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: The table is just what I needed to complete my patio for summer. It matches perfectly to chairs I already have, and I expect this will last many years based on the sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: christopher donach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed. Extremely well priced, easy to assemble, and looks like pictured. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne P. Lovelette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough not to get knocked over. it was attractive and as described
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mc

customer_reviews.title: ... finding the right size table but this one is perfect and very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: We have a narrow screen porch and were having trouble finding the right size table but this one is perfect and very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered with out the proper screws. Too expensive for poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: The proper screws were missing so my helper wasn't able to assemble it. I will like a refund since i am not able to put it together for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy, but smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy, but smaller than I thought it would be. It’s also too tall for the chairs I have. I think it’s better to buy a set of chairs and table together.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but good quality for the price. Good for 4 seats. Not a full size patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Very heavy made and easy assembled
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Very heavy made and easy assembled. Trick to lining up legs with table is to turn upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be sturdy, BUT . . .
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be sturdy, BUT received no instructions and two of the same legs. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and really looks nice on my deck!🐞
customer_reviews.author: Virginia blakley

customer_reviews.title: However the bolts needed to attach the legs to the ...
customer_reviews.text: However the bolts needed to attach the legs to the table top are missing and I can't attach them yet!
customer_reviews.author: Janice De Groot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture and measurements are accurate. Durable and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: A. W

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger and it's already starting to rust after one month outside!
customer_reviews.author: Ole' Vista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and very attractive. It matched my existing chairs well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my deck and just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: We love our new outdoor table
customer_reviews.text: We love our new outdoor table. It works fine for two-four people and is just the right size for our balcony.
customer_reviews.author: jkr

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly. Extremely sturdy. It's nice to be able to put something together and not be frustrated. We would order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is fine, just had some issues with getting all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is fine , just had some issues with getting all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W

customer_reviews.title: The table is better made than the photos could show
customer_reviews.text: The table is better made than the photos could show. Also it is the perfect size to fit our outdoor deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Winkel

customer_reviews.title: Love my new table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table and so easy to assemble! Heavy and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kline

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape with all necessary parts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape with all necessary parts...quite easy to assemble...sturdy and great looking as well...perfect shape for my long, but not too deep balcony...just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the bolts sheared off, no way to replace. Table top not fully flat
customer_reviews.author: Lee Landini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy,, but smaller than I expected. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Scovitch

customer_reviews.title: A great outdoor table.
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy duty table that is easily assembled. It is perfect for my outdoor barbeque pit because it is not damaged by weather.
customer_reviews.author: ByTheWater

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Some sloppy welds. Bent metal and gaps in seams. Not what was pictured. Picture shows different mesh and rounded corners. Table that arrived had squared corners and different mesh. i wanted the rounded corners because I have an energetic kids. I see some bonked heads with this table. Disappointed. But it's too big to send back and I need a table. I do not recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: much better than I had expected. Very good quality and I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Rectangular Black mesh top table
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Easy assembly and very sturdy. This table replaces one that cost twice as much but had a glass top that did not survive a heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: William Foley

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for a smaller aluminum dining table for my small deck. This fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a smaller garden area. Sturdy construction and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: VSR

customer_reviews.title: but they assembled easily and seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of them. Time will tell if they hold up, but they assembled easily and seem sturdy. They have yet to be tested by the grandsons 4 of them under 7.
customer_reviews.author: SBP

customer_reviews.title: I will find a use for it but am not able to use it for my original intent due to the poor quality. It is definitely not worth th
customer_reviews.text: I've learned a lesson buying this table - to NOT buy tables online. I will find a use for it but am not able to use it for my original intent due to the poor quality. It is definitely not worth the $168 that I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

product_meta.title: Oak Street Manufacturing OD3048 Rectangular Black Mesh Top Outdoor Table, 48" Length x 30" Width
product_meta.description: Oak Street Manufacturing rectangular black mesh top outdoor table. Our outdoor furniture gives you classic patio seating that will stand up to your weather conditions. Square table is Zinc-plated with a black powder coat finish. The table top is constructed with the classic mesh look and includes an umbrella hole (umbrella not included). Measures 48-inch length by 30-inch width.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
